description: This file defines an admin page component for managing products in a React/Next.js application. It includes functionality to list, load, and delete products, with UI components for rendering a table and handling user interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads product data from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a product by ID after user confirmation and reloads the product list.
